attributes.action: To stop the golden mile amusement from being destroyed
attributes.additional_details:
The golden mile amusement is a part of Blackpool’s history, we do not need anymore hotels in Blackpool. 

I’ve been coming to Blackpool ever since I was little, I used love going into this arcade.

We need the golden mile to be left alone, and for them to destroy somewhere else that isn’t popular.

If they want hotels, why don’t they refurbish the old ones? Like the hotel above happy dayz arcade? The toilets are literally coming off in that place.

Please help to keep the spirit and history of Blackpool alive
attributes.background:
So there is this arcade in Blackpool, that has been there for so long, it’s a part of Blackpool, a part of its history.

Please can we stop this amusement from being destroyed

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
